title: What are the odds in favor of a red marble when your bag contains 3 red marbles, 2 blue marbles, and 5 yellow marbles? - Quora

response.answer_text: Odds are calculated as (number of results in favor) : (number of results not in favor). There are 3 results in favor in your example and the reaming 7 marbles are not in favor. That makes the odds 3:7.
